Description:
Detects exceptions in velocity template renderer, this most likely happens due to dynamic rendering of user input and may lead to RCE.

Author: Moti Harmats
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Server Side Template Injection In Velocity
Query: sourcetype like 'velocity-%' eql select * from _source_ where Query('ParseErrorException OR VelocityException OR TemplateInitException')
